abstract: Jackie Robinson West, Chicago team that won 2014 Little League World Series, files lawsuit against league's governing body for allegedly improperly stripping team of their title; some players are believed to live outside league boundaries; other youth sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jackie Robinson West, the Chicago team that won the national title at the Little League World Series last year, announced a lawsuit against Little League’s governing body.
snippet: Jackie Robinson West, the Chicago team that won the national title at the Little League World Series last year, announced a lawsuit against Little League’s governing body.
